hadiths.text: Abu-Huraira reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) as saying:He who took a bath and then came for Jumu'a prayer and then prayed what was fixed for him, then kept silence till the Imam finished the sermon, and then prayed along with him, his sins between that time and the next Friday would be forgiven, and even of three days more

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ مَنِ اسْتَمَعَ وَأَنْصَتَ فِي الْخُطْبَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of one who remains silent and listens attentively during the khutbah
